com.scvngr.levelup.core.model.util

Class JsonUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scvngr.levelup.core.model.util.JsonUtils

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class JsonUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to work with JSONObject and avoid its bugs. .

      • optString

        @Nullable
public static java.lang.String optString(@NonNull
                                  JSONObject json,
                                  @NonNull
                                  java.lang.String key)
        Helper method that doesn't return some fake version of null if the string is null, it returns null.
        Parameters:
        json - the JSONObject.
        key - the key in json.
        Returns:
        String mapping for key in json or null if no mapping exists.

      • optIntegerSet

        @Nullable
public static java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> optIntegerSet(@NonNull
                                                      JSONObject json,
                                                      @NonNull
                                                      java.lang.String key)
                                                      throws JSONException
        Loads a Set of Integer from a JSONArray of integers.
        Parameters:
        json - the object to read from.
        key - the key in json.
        Returns:
        a set of integers loaded from the array of integers at the given key or null if either the key is not present or is set to null.
        Throws:
        JSONException - if the array contents aren't integers.

        Loads a Set of Strings from a JSONArray of strings.
        Parameters:
        json - the object to read from.
        key - the key in json.
        Returns:
        a set of strings loaded from the array of strings at the given key or null if either the key is not present or is set to null.
        Throws:
        JSONException - if the array contents aren't strings.

      • optMonetaryValue

        @Nullable
public static MonetaryValue optMonetaryValue(@NonNull
                                      JSONObject json,
                                      @NonNull
                                      java.lang.String key)
                                      throws JSONException
        Gets an optional MonetaryValue object from the JSON at the key passed.
        Parameters:
        json - the JSONObject to get the MonetaryValue from.
        key - the key in the JSONObject to get the MonetaryValue from.
        Returns:
        a MonetaryValue from the parsed long or null.
        Throws:
        JSONException - if the parsing fails.

      • getMonetaryValue

        @NonNull
public static MonetaryValue getMonetaryValue(@NonNull
                                     JSONObject json,
                                     @NonNull
                                     java.lang.String key)
                                      throws JSONException
        Gets a required MonetaryValue object from the JSON at the key passed or throws a JSONException if it's missing.
        Parameters:
        json - the JSONObject to get the MonetaryValue from.
        key - the key in the JSONObject to get the MonetaryValue from.
        Returns:
        a MonetaryValue from the parsed long.
        Throws:
        JSONException - if the parsing fails.
